Use Rebuff in your own apps

Rebuff helps you validate your LLM input (prompt) and outputs to reduce risks of leaks. Check out the code samples below to see how to integrate it to your applications.
const promptGuard = require("prompt-guard");
promptGuard.detect(prompt);
